explains: adv. 智力上；理智地；知性上

sentences.en: She ran off with an intellectually challenged ski instructor.
sentences.cn: 她与一位有智力障碍的滑雪教练私奔了。

sentences.en: Leading scientists claim breast-fed babies are intellectually brighter.
sentences.cn: 权威科学家们称母乳喂养的婴儿智力比较高。

sentences.en: The exact type of stimulation that an individual uses is not as important as being intellectually engaged.
sentences.cn: 个体使用的具体刺激方式并不如智力投入重要。
